thread.title: A disaster from start to finish - I left after 1 night of a 3 day stay
thread.title_full: A disaster from start to finish - I left after 1 night of a 3 day stay - Review of Prince's Square Apartments, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: 11mpg
title: A disaster from start to finish - I left after 1 night of a 3 day stay
text:
The booking process went wrong & when I tried to call the apartments they didn't pick up and took 24 hours to respond to my email. Apparently they do not deal with people over the phone.
The apartment was in the basement with no natural light and a window which overlooked a wall. You couldn't open the windows as it would have been a security risk.It was hot and airless. The sofas were incredibly uncomfortable.
The list of faults is endless:
No bath plug - I asked for one but was told they weren't provided. You couldn't go and buy one because they are non-standard. So basically even though they advertise a bath, you aren't allowed to use one. The bathroom shelf was grey unpainted metal and covered in rust. No remote control for the TV and non-standard channels so you had to scroll through hundreds of channels whilst standing by the TV in order to find the channel you want. Bath enamel was chipped, floor and carpet was dirty. There wasn't enough cutlery for the 4 people who were allowed on the booking and there was only one wine glass. Toilet seat was loose Heater in lounge wasn't working. Toaster was missing the knob and ALL of the pictures on the wall were hung really crookedly, showing a complete lack of care.
The location and size of the apartment was good - but that is about the only good thing I can say. It was so depressing that I left 2 days early. No way is this a 4 star standard apartment.
Room Tip: Don't stay here! See more room tips
